metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48571 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
memcached 1.6.7 allows a Denial of Service via multi-packet uploads in UDP.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48571` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

memcached - 1.5.6-0ubuntu1.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: memcached package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.6-0ubuntu1.2+esm1').
